content: whorl an un-pattern engineered by casandra lyons materials  malabrigo yarn lace 100% merino wool 470 yds/430 m or any laceweight yarn 1 skein the cowl shown used approximately 375 yards of yarn  size 5 3 75 mm 24 -long circular needle finished dimensions and sizing 26 circumference 18 from top to bottom edges shown on a 12 5 neck as written there are 11 repeats of the lace around the circumference if you wish to avoid asymmetry or an uneven number of points the stitch count can be adjusted by adding/subtracting stitches in multiples of 12 this will also increase/decrease the finished circumference of the cowl gauge is unimportant for this project but for good drape and ease of blocking your knitting should be loose if you knit tightly go up a needle size directions cast on 132 stitches join to work in the round work garter stitch border knit 1 round purl 1 round knit 1 round work leaf lace until the cowl measures 13 unstretched ending on either a round 10 or a round 20 garter stitch border purl 1 round knit 1 round bind off loosely finishing weave in ends wet block to approximately 18 long from top edge to bottom edge and 13 wide 26 circumference allow to dry completely unpin trim ends and wear leaf lace written directions round 1 *k 4 slip one k2tog psso k 4 yo k 1 yo repeat from * to end of round round 2 and all even-numbered rounds knit around round 3 *k 3 slip one k2tog psso k 3 yo k 3 yo repeat from * to end of round round 5 *k 2 slip one k2tog psso k 2 yo k 5 yo repeat from * to end of round round 7 *k 1 slip one k2tog psso k 1 yo k 7 yo repeat from * to end of round round 9 * slip one k2tog psso yo k 9 yo repeat from * to end of round round 11 *yo k 1 yo k 4 slip one k2tog psso k 4 repeat from * to end of round round 13 *yo k 3 yo k 3 slip one k2tog psso k 3 repeat from * to end of round round 15 *yo k 5 yo k 2 slip one k2tog psso k 2 repeat from * to end of round round 17 *yo k 7 yo k 1 slip one k2tog psso k 1 repeat from * to end of round round 19 *yo k 9 yo slip one k2tog psso repeat from * to end of round charted directions even-numbered rounds are not charted round 2 and all even-numbered rounds knit to end of round
